summary: This is a brief email correspondence forwarding a previously drafted prosecutorial memo from December 2019 concerning a co-conspirator investigation. The email highlights that page 62 of the attached memo contains information regarding meetings with co-conspirators' counsel, specifically starting with a meeting involving the attorney for 'GM'.

events.title: Drafting of Co-conspirator Prosecution Memo
events.description: A prosecutorial memorandum regarding a co-conspirator investigation was drafted.

keyFacts: A prosecutorial memo concerning a co-conspirator investigation was drafted on December 19, 2019.
The email, sent in July 2025, forwards this memo, indicating ongoing relevance or review of the 2019 investigation.
Page 62 of the memo details meetings with attorneys representing co-conspirators.
The information on page 62 begins with a meeting involving the attorney(s) for an individual referred to as 'GM'.
